Text: I forgot to add that thos COMAND DVD if for North America (US and Canada).

Downloaded and burned the image to DVD+RW using DVD Decrypter. When I insert the disc into my Nav module my Comand display reports "No DVD. Please insert a Nav DVD."

Has anyone else had trouble with this disc? I have burned the DVD twice. Still no luck.

I have a 2005 E320 amd am currently using a 2004.2 NAV DVD.

To rule out the possibility that I am using an incompatible DVD or that my burning settings were bad, I made a duplicate copy of my 2004.2 DVD using the same disc type and burning procedure that I used for the 2006.2 DVD. My Nav module has no problem reading my copied 2004.2 DVD.

Any ideas???
You need to update the firmware in your COMAND system to use this disk. I know the process work as I am using it in my car.
This is old where is the 2009/2010 version?
